Experience.title: Ing√©nieur mobile
content: Created a hospital waste collection app using Clean Architecture, cubit, and Flutter. The app was designed to be user-friendly and featured efficient state management, making it easy for healthcare professionals to track their waste collection and arrange for disposal. With this app, chemical groups could easily locate and request hospital waste for their use.

developed a mobile counseling app for Citrine, enabling students to track course progress, participate in activities, and complete surveys. The app was designed to be user-friendly and accessible, providing students with the support they needed to succeed.

content: Learned the basics of mobile development using Flutter and Flask, as well as gaining some experience with AWS services

Developed and implementated a loyalty application that utilized blockchain technology (Ethereum) and tokens as loyalty points. This experience allowed me to develop my skills in mobile development and gain an understanding of cutting-edge technologies such as blockchain.

Experience.title: Game developer
content: Learned the basics of game development using Unity

Developed of an enemy AI system for non-player characters as part of a game development project. This experience allowed me to hone my skills in programming and game design, as well as gain a deeper understanding of AI systems in gaming.

Contribution to the development of a 3D third-person game using Unity. This experience allowed me to gain hands-on experience with game development, including level design, asset creation, and implementation of game mechanics.
